summary: This mod adds expert level Healing, Flames, Sparks and Frostbite spells to the game.
descriptionHtml:
This mod simply adds expert level Healing, Flames, Sparks and Frostbite spells to the game. They are added to the leveled list so they can be found like any other expert level spells of the same school.

These spells have four times higher magnitude and six times higher magicka cost than their novice level version of the same spell. They also benefit from the perks (Augmented Flames, Regeneration etc).

There are two versions available:

-ExpertConcentrationSpells = Spells have same name as their novice level spells.
-ExpertConcentrationSpellsAltered = Spells are named to Searing Flames, Freezing Frostbite, Charged Sparks and Greater Healing.


Installation: Extract file to Skyrim/Data folder. Use launcher and in data files select ExpertConcentrationSpells.esp.

Uninstallation: Delete file.

Compatibility: This mod is not compatible with mods that change or alter leveled lists of the expert level spell tomes. 

My other mods: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5863]Vampire Upgrade[/url] - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5866]Werewolf Upgrade[/url] - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34620/]Lore Friendly Spells[/url]
author: undomir

files.name: ExpertConcentrationSpells
files.changelogHtml: Reduced the magicka cost of the spells.
